amendment.description: To make available funds for construction and completion of a new facility.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1990 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1990 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S13346; text: CR S13346) To make available funds for construction and completion of a new facility.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1990 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1990 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Domenici.
